--- layout: default title: Themes ---

Themes

HowTo Import a Theme:
  1. Click on one thumbnail to open bigger preview
  2. Right click on the preview and save the link url to get the settings
  3. On yout phone open the settings of the watchface and navigate to
    BACKUP / RESTORE -> Import
  4. Paste the settings in the input field
  5. Click on LOAD BACKUP
  6. Save the watchface
